messages.title: Why we're backing Lee Godfrey
messages.content: Testimonials from local residents Nora Pearce, Cassie Bennett, and Chris Moore expressing support for Lee Godfrey and disappointment with the current representation.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan to bring '2,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs' into the healthcare system and to repeal 'Tory/Lib Dem NHS privatisation laws'.
Labour's plan to build 'at least 200,000 new homes a year', protection for renters, and a 'national register of landlords'.
Promises to extend parenting provisions with '25 hours of childcare - extending free childcare to all 3 and 4-year-olds'.
Commitment to 'climate change, improving our air quality in Kingston and promoting a sustainable economy'.

issues.environment: Commitment to 'climate change, improving our air quality in Kingston and promoting a sustainable economy'.
issues.health: Plan to bring '2,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs' into the healthcare system and to repeal 'Tory/Lib Dem NHS privatisation laws'.

housing.content: Labour's plan to build 'at least 200,000 new homes a year', protection for renters, and a 'national register of landlords'.

leaflet.personalStatement: A nation for the many, not just the privileged few.

images.caption: Image of Lee Godfrey with a caption: 'A nation for the many, not just the privileged few.'
